mapper.select: select c_number from category where c_name
mapper.insert: insert into subjects(c_number, s_name, m_id, s_quantity) value(#{c_number}, #{s_name}, #{m_id}, #{s_quantity})
mapper.select: select s_number from subjects where s_name=#{s_name}
mapper.insert: insert into question(s_number, m_id, q_name, q_filename, q_select1, q_select2, q_select3, q_select4, q_select5, q_answer, q_exposition) value(#{s_number}, #{m_id}, #{q_name}, #{q_filename}, #{q_select1}, #{q_select2}, #{q_select3}, #{q_select4}, #{q_select5}, #{q_answer}, #{q_exposition})
mapper.select: select * from subjects order by s_number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
